content: {"name": "Philadelphia Legal Assistance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "They provide free legal advice and representation to low income residents of Philadelphia. You must be a US citizen or have legal immgration status and your income must be below 200% to qualify for help. Explore all the legal issues they help with: https://philalegal.org/explore-legal-issue\n\nCall or apply online for help with any legal issue: https://philalegal.org/apply", "email": "", "url": "https://philalegal.org/services/food-stamps", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "718 Arch Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Center City East", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19106", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.952915, "longitude": -75.1523431}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 981-3800", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}]}
